description: Bright, clean studio apartment located in the heart of Manhattan, furnished with lots of love. 10 minutes walking distance to Central Park and 5th Avenue. Bloomingdales is right across the street. Very well connected to several subway stations. Plenty of restaurants and bars close by.
name: Stylish Studio Apartment close to Central Park
review:
Great Apartment!

Excellent location! Evereything was cool with Corin. 

We will repeat!
